title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7077.3 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7077.3 - Policy

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, each
facility shall establish and implement policies and procedures with respect to
the conditions, programming, duration, recordkeeping and reporting of
residential rehabilitation units. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7077.3

Adpoted

New

York State Register August 10, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue Issue 32, eff. 8/10/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
